AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wake Walkers blademaster
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Always nimble on [PAWN_possessive] feet, [PAWN_nameDef] was a whirlwind of blades during combat. Those that escaped [PAWN_possessive] blades, would soon be felled by the beasts of the Wake Walkers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wake Walkers sentinel
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Once a guard at one of the many Maormeri embassies, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to turn to a life of piracy, as working conditions constantly grew worse. [PAWN_pronoun] joined the Wake Walkers, which was a rather odd choice, as [PAWN_nameDef] was neither nimble nor good with animals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wake Walkers archer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't content with just turning someone into a pincushion, [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to make them suffer a bit. Seeing as the Wake Walkers often utilised animals, coming across various venoms wasn't exactly an issue.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wake Walkers mender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a member of the Wake Walkers, [PAWN_nameDef] had to not only tend to [PAWN_possessive] fellow crew members, but also the beasts they fought alongside. Luckily [PAWN_pronoun] was used to dealing with animals, especially animals that didn't want to be dealt with.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wake Walkers beastmaster
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a beastmaster, [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the most important members of the Wake Walkers, excluding the captain of course. [PAWN_pronoun] had assembled a small menagerie for use in combat, from giant snakes, to the ferocious haj mota.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wake Walkers captain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: There were many ways pirate captains could display their power, and [PAWN_nameDef] decided [PAWN_pronoun] wanted the largest beast [PAWN_pronoun] could find. So that's how [PAWN_nameDef] wound up with a pet haj mota.
